name: Mazy Lock
description:
Mazy Lock is a movable labyrinth game with the realistic works which is controlled by your movements. Your goal is to open the safe combination lock. Tilting device you can guide the puck and keep the obstacles and movable maze walls under control at the same time. Put the puck in the finish hole at each level and you will gain a subsequent numbers to complete the lock code. You can calibrate for a suitable playing position.

Features:
• 4 categories of combination locks (18 different levels of difficulty)
• Shadows
• Calibration
• Realistic Physics
• Game Center Support
